request.description:
### Create New Proposal

This endpoint allows you to create a new proposal.

#### Request Body
- `titulo` (string, required): The title of the proposal.
- `descripcion` (string, required): The description of the proposal.
- `palabraClave` (string, required): The keyword associated with the proposal.

#### Response
The response will be a JSON object with the following properties:
- `titulo` (string): The title of the created proposal.
- `descripcion` (string): The description of the created proposal.
- `palabraClave` (string): The keyword associated with the created proposal.
- `id` (number): The unique identifier of the created proposal.

#### JSON Schema
```json
{
    "type": "object",
    "properties": {
        "titulo": { "type": "string" },
        "descripcion": { "type": "string" },
        "palabraClave": { "type": "string" },
        "id": { "type": "number" }
    }
}

response.name: CreatePropuesta

request.description:
# Create Proposal
This endpoint allows you to create a new proposal.

## Request Body
- `titulo` (string, required): The title of the proposal.
- `descripcion` (string, required): The description of the proposal.
- `palabraClave` (string, required): The keyword associated with the proposal.

## Response
Upon successful creation, the response will include the following fields:
- `titulo` (string): The title of the created proposal.
- `descripcion` (string): The description of the created proposal.
- `palabraClave` (string): The keyword associated with the created proposal.
- `id` (integer): The unique identifier of the created proposal.

Example:
```json
{
    "titulo": "Sample Title",
    "descripcion": "Sample Description",
    "palabraClave": "Sample Keyword",
    "id": 123
}
```

response.name: CreatePropuesta Segunda

request.description:
### Get Proposal Details

This endpoint retrieves the details of a specific proposal with the given ID.

#### Request

- Method: GET
    
- Endpoint: `http://localhost:3000/propuestas/2`
    

#### Response

Upon a successful request, the server will respond with the details of the proposal in the following format:

``` json
{
    "id": 0,
    "titulo": "",
    "descripcion": "",
    "palabraClave": ""
}

 ```

The response includes the unique identifier (`id`), title (`titulo`), description (`descripcion`), and keyword (`palabraClave`) of the proposal.

response.name: GetPropuestaById

request.description:
The `GET` request to `/propuestas` endpoint retrieves a list of proposals. The response for this request is a JSON array containing objects with the following properties:

- `id` (number): The unique identifier for the proposal.
    
- `titulo` (string): The title of the proposal.
    
- `descripcion` (string): The description of the proposal.
    
- `palabraClave` (string): The keyword associated with the proposal.
    

Here is an example response for this request:

``` json
[
  {
    "id": 0,
    "titulo": "",
    "descripcion": "",
    "palabraClave": ""
  }
]

 ```

response.name: GetAllPropuestas

request.description:
### Delete Professor

This endpoint is used to delete a specific professor by their ID.

#### Request

- Method: DELETE
    
- URL: `http://localhost:3000/profesores/999`
    

#### Response

The response for this request is a JSON schema describing the structure of the response body.
